column4: I can't open a bash script from my ssd, there is only some flicker and then silence. When I copy the file to the Desktop, I can open it normally. What could be wrong?

I can't open a bash script from my ssd, there is only some flicker and then silence. When I copy the file to the Desktop, I can open it normally. What could be wrong? "open" = double click and use with texteditor
